all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But behold, I say unto you, that little children are redeemed from the foundation of the world through mine Only Begotten;
Doctrine and Covenants 29:46
Quote of the Day
"Striving to be the salt of the earth includes so much more than an endless scrolling of reels on a six-inch screen."
José A. Teixeira | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
